title: Create a project
name: add_project
description: Creates a project object given the title.

Success 200.description: Current date specifying the created time of project

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
"title must be alphanumeric"

title: Deletes a project
name: delete_project
description: Deletes the project. Removes all tracks corresponding to project. Also removes the public project if it was public.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
"ProjectId: xxxxxxxxxx has been deleted"

401.description: You are not the owner of this project

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
"You are not the owner of this project"

title: Get the project object
name: get_project
description: Gets the project details of the projectId

Success 200.description: Current date specifying the created time of project

401.description: You are not the owner of this project

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
"You are not the owner of this project"

title: Update project name
name: new_project_title
description: Renames the title of a project

401.description: You are not the owner of this project

examples.title: Response (example):

title: Get list of tracks

description: Collects all the tracks corresponding to the project

title: Gets list of projects
name: user_project_list
description: Gets a list of projects that belongs to the user

Success 200.description: List of projects containing their id's and titles

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 401 Bad Request
"You are not logged in"

title: Deletes a public project
name: delete_pubProj
description: Deletes the public project. Removes public files from database.

401.description: ProjectId: xxxxxxxxx does not belong to you

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
"You are not the owner of this project"

title: Get the public project file
name: get_pubProj
description: Gets the public project file and downloads it.

Parameter.description: ID of public project file to get

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
"You are not logged in"

title: Gets list of public projects
name: get_pubProj_list
description: Gets a list of public projects that can be viewed

Success 200.description: List of public projects containing author, title, publicDate and pubFileId

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 401 Bad Request
"You are not logged in"

title: Get Max Homepage size
name: get_pubProj_pageSize
description: Gets the maximmum number of pages at homepage. Each page can display 3 audio files. So The number of pages is number of public projects divided by 3.

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 401 Bad Request
"You are not logged in"

title: Create a public project
name: upload_public_project
description: Through our web application, you can publish your project publically. This will automatically generate the complete audio file and upload that audio file so that other user's can listen to your project.

Success 200.description: Current date specifying the created time of project

404.description: ProjectId: xxxxxxxxxx does not belong to you

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 404 Bad Request
"You are not the owner of this project"

title: Deletes a track
name: delete_track
description: Deletes the Track. Removes all tracks files as well.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
"Track: xxxxxxxxxx has been deleted"

401.description: TrackId: xxxxxxxxx does not belong to you

examples.title: Response (example):

HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
"TrackId: xxxxxxxxx does not belong to you"

examples.title: Response (example):

title: Get the track object
name: track_info
description: Gets the track details including all the settings and name.

Fade in duration of track in project
Fade out shape of track in project
Fade out duration of track in project

401.description: You are not the owner of this track

examples.title: Response (example):

"You are not the owner of this track"

title: Update track settings
name: update_track_option
description: Updates a tracks information. The option must be one of: [name, gain, muted, soloed, start, fadeIn_shape, fadeIn_duration, fadeOut_shape, fadeOut_duration, cuein, cueout, waveOutlineColor, stereoPan].

400.description: option type is invalid, refer to API for valid option types

401.description: You are not the owner of this track

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
"You are not the owner of this track"

title: Create a track
name: upload_audio_track
description: Upload a track for the project. To upload this, you will need to create a form data through curl or use our web app to upload the track into a project.

Parameter.description: Project ID of track to be attatched to

Success 200.description: Fade in shape of track in project
Fade in duration of track in project
Fade out shape of track in project
Fade out duration of track in project

404.description: You are not the owner of this project

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 404 Bad Request
"You are not the owner of this project"

title: Gets full name of user
name: get_user_name
description: Retrieves the full name of the currently logged in user. This is specified at register and if you signed in through google, this retrieves your family and given name from your google account.

title: Sign in via google
name: sign_in_google
description: Signs in as a google user. In order to properly utilize this, you will need to log in through the homepage of the web application. Google log in cannot be done by console because they have a user interface that guides you through logging into google. Upon curling, you will recieve a re-direct url along with cookies that need to be used for google to confirm communication.

title: Sign in as a local user
name: sign_in_local
description: Signs in as a local user and returns the cookie. If using a web browser, cookie will be saved to browser. Otherwise please save the cookie and send it back when requesting for 'user' level requests.

title: Sign out of current account
name: sign_out
description: Signs out of any logged in user. This means that if you were signed in through local or google, you will sign out of the current session. Provide the cookie and it will be destroyed.

title: Create a local user
name: sign_up_local
description: Creates a local user account.

400.description: Password must contain only alphanumeric and certain special characters
